claims.claim: Campaign performance increases by up to 200%
claims.quote: Increases campaign performance by up to 200%

claims.claim: Marketers perform analytics and campaign setup 10x faster
claims.quote: Marketers perform analytics and campaign setup 10x faster

claims.claim: 5-7% uplift in annual revenue across enterprise clients
claims.quote: 5–7% uplift in annual revenue across enterprise clients

claims.claim: 15-30% increase in customer lifetime value for customers with marketing consent
claims.quote: 15-30% increase in CLV on customers with marketing consent

claims.claim: 40-50% improvement in return on ad spend (ROAS)
claims.quote: 40–50% improvement in return on ad spend (ROAS)

claims.claim: Up to 50% improvement in return on ad spend through predictive audiences
claims.quote: Marketers can then export predictive audiences, products or customers with any attributes directly to Google Ads and other platforms, with clients reporting up to 50% improvement in return on ad spend (ROAS).

claims.claim: Analytics workflows run up to 10 times faster
claims.quote: Retailers using the platform have reported analytics workflows that run up to 10 times faster than before.

claims.claim: Predictive segmentation saves hundreds of hours per year
claims.quote: According to one client, predictive segmentation alone has saved them hundreds of hours per year.

claims.claim: Basket analysis feature saves 5 months of development time
claims.quote: As one customer put it, 'The basket analysis alone would have taken us five months to build, and now it's out of the box'
